Software Development Engineer (SDE).description:
Job Summary: As a Software Development Engineer (SDE), you will design, build, test, and maintain high-quality software applications. You’ll work through the full SDLC, collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop scalable products.

Responsibilities:
- Gather and analyze user requirements and turn them into technical specs
- Architect, code, and debug software in Java/Python/C++
- Design and optimize databases and microservices
- Write unit and integration tests, conduct code reviews
- Maintain thorough documentation
- Collaborate in Agile/Scrum teams
- Troubleshoot and resolve production issues
- Stay current with latest technology trends and suggest improvements

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS/IT or related field
- 1-3 years of experience preferred
- Proficiency in Java, Python, or C++
- Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, OOP
- Experience designing REST APIs and microservices
- Familiarity with Git and CI/CD
- Excellent problem-solving, communication, and teamwork

Preferred Qualifications:
- Cloud experience (AWS/Azure/GCP)
- Exposure to Docker/Kubernetes
- Contribution to open-source projects

Benefits:
- Competitive salary (₹8–20 LPA depending on experience)
- Flexible/Remote work options
- Upskilling programs, hackathons, and mentorship
- Comprehensive health insurance, paid leaves, ESOPs

Full-Stack Developer.description:
Job Summary: Join our full-stack team to build end-to-end web/mobile apps that delight users. Drive projects from frontend UIs to backend logic and cloud deployments.

Responsibilities:
- Develop, test, and deliver responsive UIs using React/Angular/Next.js
- Design RESTful APIs and backend services with Node.js/Express or Python
- Build and maintain databases (SQL/NoSQL)
- Implement authentication, authorization, and security best practices
- Deploy applications to AWS/Azure/cloud; automate with CI/CD
- Review code and participate in Agile ceremonies
- Communicate status and blockers proactively

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS/IT or equivalent experience
- 1+ years hands-on with JavaScript, React or Angular, Node.js/Python
- Strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and modern JS frameworks
- Experience with version control (Git), API design, database integration
- Good interpersonal and communication abilities

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with TypeScript, Next.js, GraphQL, or containerization (Docker)
- Familiarity with cloud services and DevOps basics

Benefits:
- Salary range ₹6–18 LPA
- Remote work, flexible hours
- Work with modern tech stack and tools
- Health insurance, team outings, and L&D

Backend Developer.description:
Job Summary: As a Backend Developer, you will engineer scalable server-side logic and APIs, ensuring reliable performance for end users.

Responsibilities:
- Architect and build RESTful APIs & microservices using Java/Spring Boot or Python/Node.js
- Integrate with databases (SQL/NoSQL), cache solutions (Redis)
- Create scalable, secure, and maintainable backend systems
- Participate in schema design and SQL/ORM optimization
- Automate tests, deploy via CI/CD pipelines
- Document APIs and contribute to Agile planning

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in CS/related field
- 1+ years experience with Java, Python, or Node.js
- Experience with REST API, SQL, backend frameworks
- Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, cloud platforms
- Strong analytical and debugging skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Kafka, Redis, GraphQL
- Security-conscious coding

Benefits:
- Salary range ₹7–16 LPA
- Hybrid/remote options
- Paid leaves, health insurance

Frontend Developer.description:
Job Summary: Join our UI team to develop interactive frontends with modern web technologies. Work closely with designers to create visually stunning and user-centric features.

Responsibilities:
- Build responsive web pages using React/Angular/Vue.js
- Optimize for performance, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility
- Implement UI logic, integrate APIs, manage state
- Collaborate with UX/UI designers and backend devs
- Write unit and integration tests
- Maintain component libraries and design systems

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS or similar
- 1+ years experience building web interfaces
- Strong command of JavaScript (ES6+), HTML, CSS, and a major JS framework
- Eye for detail and usability
- Good teamwork and communication

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with TypeScript, testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress)

Benefits:
- Salary ₹6–15 LPA
- Modern tools, flexible culture

Mobile App Developer.description:
Job Summary: Lead the development of mobile applications for iOS/Android platforms, delivering best-in-class user experiences.

Responsibilities:
- Build, test, and maintain scalable apps using React Native, Flutter, Swift, or Kotlin
- Collaborate with designers to translate requirements into interactive apps
- Integrate REST APIs, push notifications, third-party SDKs
- Optimize for performance and device compatibility
- Publish to App Store/Play Store and maintain updates

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS or related; 1-3 years experience
- Hands-on with React Native/Flutter/Swift/Kotlin
- Experience integrating APIs, mobile UI/UX
- Familiarity with app life cycle and deployment
- Teamwork, adaptability, and communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Working with Firebase, mobile testing tools, native bridges

Benefits:
- Salary ₹6–17 LPA
- Learning allowance, flexible hours, health insurance

DevOps Engineer.description:
Job Summary: As a DevOps Engineer, you will build and maintain the automation and cloud infrastructure needed to enable continuous software delivery and reliable systems.

Responsibilities:
- Design, implement, and manage CI/CD pipelines
- Automate deployments, monitoring, and testing
- Maintain and optimize cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure/GCP)
- Ensure security and compliance of systems
- Troubleshoot production issues and deploy fixes
- Collaborate with developers, QA, and IT
- Create and maintain infrastructure-as-code using Terraform/Ansible

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s degree in IT/CS field or relevant experience
- 1-3 years in DevOps or system administration
- Hands-on with Docker, Kubernetes, GitLab/Jenkins, Linux
- Proficient in at least one scripting language (Python/Bash)
- Familiar with CI/CD, cloud deployment, and system monitoring
- Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with infrastructure as code tools
- Exposure to configuration management (Ansible, Chef)

Benefits:
- Salary ₹7–20 LPA
- Flexible/remote work; L&D budget; team events
- Comprehensive health and wellness benefits

Cloud Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Architect, implement, and maintain secure, scalable cloud infrastructure for enterprise applications.

Responsibilities:
- Design and maintain cloud environments (AWS/Azure/GCP)
- Deploy and monitor cloud resources using best practices
- Manage storage, networking, security, and backups
- Implement serverless architectures where appropriate
- Optimize costs and ensure compliance
- Troubleshoot cloud-related incidents
- Document architectures and procedures

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in IT, CS, or related
- 1+ years experience in cloud engineering
- Proficient with AWS/Azure/GCP core services
- Hands-on with automation tools (Terraform, CloudFormation)
- Networking, security, identity and access management knowledge
- Analytical thinking, documentation, teamwork

Preferred Qualifications:
- Relevant certifications (AWS/Azure)

Benefits:
- Salary ₹8–22 LPA
- Remote/hybrid, paid certifications, health coverage

Cloud Architect.description:
Job Summary: Lead cloud strategy, design scalable multi-cloud solutions, and advise on cloud adoption for large organizations.

Responsibilities:
- Develop enterprise-wide cloud adoption and migration strategies
- Architect secure, scalable, and cost-effective solutions across multiple clouds
- Conduct risk and security assessments
- Lead technical teams and mentorship
- Oversee migration projects and ensure compliance
- Standardize cloud governance

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s in CS, IT, or Engineering
- 5+ years in cloud/infra roles, 2+ in architecture
- Proficiency with major cloud platforms, security
- Strong documentation and communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Certifications (AWS Professional, Azure Solutions Architect)

Benefits:
- Salary ₹12–35 LPA+
- Leadership program access, ESOPs, executive health

Site Reliability Engineer (SRE).description:
Job Summary: Ensure reliability and high availability for critical production systems by automating monitoring, scaling, and incident response.

Responsibilities:
- Build and maintain automated monitoring and alerting systems (Prometheus, Grafana)
- Coordinate incident response, root cause analysis, and on-call rotations
- Implement automation for deployments, scaling, failover
- Define and measure SLAs, SLOs, error budgets
- Collaborate with dev teams on reliability and best practices

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS, IT, or relevant field
- 1+ years in SRE/DevOps roles
- Experience with monitoring tools
- Scripting/coding for automation
- Production troubleshooting skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with large-scale distributed systems

Benefits:
- Salary ₹9–25 LPA
- Flexible work environment, learning budget, health insurance

Infrastructure Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Plan, build, and maintain scalable and secure infrastructure including servers, storage, and networks.

Responsibilities:
- Deploy and configure physical/virtual environments
- Manage backups, storage, disaster recovery
- Configure network devices, firewalls, load balancers
- Monitor for uptime and performance
- Document infrastructure and processes

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in IT, Engineering, or related field
- Server/network admin experience (Linux, Windows Server, VMware)
- Familiarity with backup, storage, and virtualization solutions
- Good written and communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Certifications (RHCE, Cisco, VMware)

Benefits:
- Salary ₹7–18 LPA
- Paid leaves, health/wellness, on-call allowance

Machine Learning Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Design, build, and deploy machine learning solutions in real-world products. Collaborate with experts to advance AI-powered applications.

Responsibilities:
- Design and build ML models and pipelines for business/industry problems
- Prepare, clean, and analyze large data sets
- Train, tune, and evaluate models using Python and ML frameworks
- Deploy, monitor, and optimize production ML models
- Collaborate with data scientists, product managers, and engineering teams
- Maintain detailed documentation and contribute to knowledge sharing

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s in CS, Statistics, Math, or related field
- 1+ years in ML development
- Practical experience with Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, and ML libraries
- Sound understanding of data structures, algorithms, probability
- Familiarity with cloud ML deployment (AWS/GCP/Azure)
- Strong communication, teamwork skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Research publication, Kaggle or competitions participation
- Experience with DevOps/MLOps

Benefits:
- Salary ₹10–30 LPA
- Remote/flexible work, training budget

Deep Learning Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Build state-of-the-art deep learning systems for vision, speech, or NLP solutions.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement deep neural networks
- Prepare, augment, and label large datasets
- Optimize models for accuracy, latency, and scale
- Deploy deep learning models to production (cloud/mobile/edge)
- Collaborate on research and publish results
- Document experiments and performance

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s in CS/EE or related field
- 1+ years deep learning experience
- Proficient with TensorFlow/PyTorch, CUDA, NumPy
- Experience with computer vision/NLP/data pipelines
- Analytical mindset, strong programming in Python/C++

Preferred:
- Contributions to open source or research

Benefits:
- Salary ₹10–32 LPA
- L&D, research funding, flexible work

NLP Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Build robust natural language understanding applications and optimize language models for business use-cases.

Responsibilities:
- Design, fine-tune, and deploy NLP models for tasks like classification, translation, QA
- Preprocess and manage text data
- Implement pipelines with tools like SpaCy, NLTK, HuggingFace
- Integrate NLP solutions with APIs and cloud services
- Monitor and retrain models based on user feedback

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s in CS, Linguistics, or related
- 1+ years developing NLP solutions
- Experience with Python, key NLP libraries
- Understanding of statistics, ML/AI
- Communication and documentation skills

Preferred:
- Experience with speech recognition, ASR, or multi-lingual datasets

Benefits:
- Salary ₹9–28 LPA
- Flexible/remote, conferences, health cover

Computer Vision Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Develop and deploy computer vision solutions for image/video processing and real-time applications.

Responsibilities:
- Design, train, and optimize image/video models
- Implement detection, segmentation, classification or tracking
- Use OpenCV, deep learning frameworks
- Integrate models into live apps and hardware
- Maintain and update datasets
- Work with multi-disciplinary teams

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS/EE/related; 1+ years relevant experience
- Exposure to OpenCV, deep learning, image processing
- Strong programming in Python/C++
- Familiar with inferencing on cloud or edge

Benefits:
- Salary ₹10–28 LPA
- Flexible work, R&D/project bonuses

AI Research Scientist.description:
Job Summary: Conduct fundamental and applied AI/ML research. Advance the state-of-the-art and contribute to future product strategy.

Responsibilities:
- Propose research directions and lead implementation
- Develop algorithms and publish findings
- Collaborate with academia and internal teams
- Mentor junior researchers
- Present at conferences

Requirements:
- Master’s/PhD in AI/ML, Statistics, CS, or related
- Publication record, strong math/stats/AI knowledge
- Expertise in Python, ML frameworks
- Analytical, communication, and writing skills

Benefits:
- Salary ₹15–40 LPA
- Patent bonuses, conf funding, sabbatical, research perks

Data Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Architect, build, and maintain scalable data pipelines and platforms to support analytics and machine learning.

Responsibilities:
- Design, implement, and optimize ETL pipelines and data workflows
- Integrate data from various sources (APIs, databases, files)
- Build and administer data lakes, warehouses (Redshift, BigQuery, Snowflake)
- Collaborate on schema/data modeling, ensure data reliability/quality
- Automate data validation & monitoring
- Partner with data scientists, analysts, and engineers
- Document solutions and ensure data governance

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS, IT, or STEM field
- 1+ years with Python, SQL, and modern data stack
- Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), orchestration (Airflow)
- Strong problem-solving and communication

Preferred Qualifications:
- Big Data experience (Spark, Kafka, Hadoop)
- DataOps, infra-as-code (Terraform), Docker

Benefits:
- Salary ₹8–24 LPA
- Remote options, learning budget, insurance

Data Analyst.description:
Job Summary: Analyze complex datasets to deliver actionable insights that inform business decisions. Visualize, report, and communicate findings to varied stakeholders.

Responsibilities:
- Analyze large structured/unstructured datasets using SQL, Excel, Python/R
- Build and maintain dashboards, generate reports
- Create data visualizations with Tableau or Power BI
- Employ statistical analyses and BI best practices
- Collaborate with business and tech teams
- Document processes and ensure data accuracy

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Math/Stats/CS/Business
- 1+ years in analytics/data roles
- Proficiency in SQL and data visualization tools
- Good written/spoken communication; business acumen

Preferred:
- Experience with Python/R
- Exposure to cloud data tools

Benefits:
- ₹6–19 LPA
- L&D support, hybrid/remote

Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst.description:
Job Summary: Build and manage data models, reports, and dashboards for business performance monitoring.

Responsibilities:
- Develop KPIs and BI reports using Tableau/Power BI
- Data modeling, dashboard building, and data storytelling
- Work with stakeholders to understand data needs
- Assure data pipeline reliability and usability
- Deliver presentations and support data-driven decisions

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Business, CS, or similar
- 1+ years in BI/analytics
- Hands-on with SQL, data visualization, BI tools
- Analytical mindset, stakeholder communication

Benefits:
- ₹7–18 LPA
- Paid certifications, hybrid/remote, insurance

Database Administrator.description:
Job Summary: Manage, secure, and optimize organization databases for reliability, security, and scalability.

Responsibilities:
- Install, configure, and upgrade databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, etc.)
- Monitor and tune performance; perform backups and recovery
- Ensure database security, compliance, data integrity
- Troubleshoot issues, support disaster recovery planning

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS or related; 1+ years DB admin experience
- Expert in database management, tuning, and optimization
- Scripting (Python/Shell), backup tools, SQL, troubleshooting

Benefits:
- ₹7–20 LPA
- Paid time off, certifications, medical

Big Data Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Architect large-scale data solutions leveraging big data technologies for real-time processing and analytics.

Responsibilities:
- Build and deploy scalable big data pipelines
- Work with Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Hive, data lakes
- Optimize data storage, retrieval, and streaming
- Automate jobs, handle large batch/streaming datasets
- Collaborate with analytics/engineering teams

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in STEM
- 1+ years with big data frameworks
- Experience building pipelines with Spark, Hadoop, Kafka
- Cloud big data tools preferred

Benefits:
- ₹10–28 LPA
- Hackathons, cloud training, insurance

Security Analyst.description:
Job Summary: Monitor, detect, and respond to information security incidents to protect company assets. Conduct threat assessments, recommend controls, and promote security awareness.

Responsibilities:
- Monitor systems/networks for security incidents
- Analyze and triage alerts, respond to threats
- Conduct regular vulnerability assessments and audits
- Investigate security breaches and document findings
- Prepare incident/forensic reports for management
- Support compliance (ISO/NIST/GDPR), security policy development
- Promote awareness and coach teams

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS, IT, Cybersecurity or related
- 1+ years in security monitoring/response
- Experience with SIEM, IDS/IPS, and endpoint protection
- Strong analytical and communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:
- Security certifications (CEH, CompTIA Security+)
- Cloud security knowledge

Benefits:
- ₹8–22 LPA
- Paid training/certifications, hybrid/remote, wellness programs

Security Engineer.description:
Job Summary: Design, test, and improve secure IT infrastructure. Conduct penetration testing, manage vulnerability programs, and support tech teams.

Responsibilities:
- Build and maintain security architecture
- Conduct and document penetration tests
- Manage network and app vulnerabilities
- Deploy and operate security tools (IDS/IPS, firewalls)
- Respond to and investigate incidents
- Educate others on security best practices

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in IT/Cybersecurity; 1+ years hands-on
- Proficient in pen testing, firewalls, scripting
- Experience with security operations and tools

Preferred:
- OSCP/CEH/CISSP

Benefits:
- ₹9–25 LPA
- Flexible schedule, medical, growth tracks

Penetration Tester (Ethical Hacker).description:
Job Summary: Assess and test organization security posture through controlled and ethical hacking. Identify weaknesses and report remediation steps.

Responsibilities:
- Plan and execute penetration tests (web, network, app)
- Simulate attacks to identify vulnerabilities
- Document and present findings to stakeholders
- Recommend security improvements
- Develop custom tools as needed

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS, InfoSec or related field
- 1+ years in pen testing/ethical hacking
- Familiar with Kali Linux, Metasploit, Burp Suite
- Strong report writing and teamwork

Certifications preferred:
- OSCP, CEH

Benefits:
- ₹8–24 LPA
- Conference budgets, flexible work, insurance

Security Architect.description:
Job Summary: Lead design and review of enterprise security architecture and policy. Oversight of risk and compliance initiatives.

Responsibilities:
- Design, review, and update security frameworks
- Develop enterprise security roadmaps
- Manage architecture reviews, audits, and compliance
- Drive secure technology adoption, vendor evaluations
- Mentor engineering teams

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s in CS, InfoSec
- 5+ years enterprise security, architecture review
- Strong understanding of frameworks (NIST, ISO 27001)

Preferred:
- CISSP, CCSP

Benefits:
- ₹15–35 LPA
- Executive health, ESOPs, hybrid/remote

Incident Response Specialist.description:
Job Summary: Respond to, investigate, and remediate cyber incidents and breaches. Conduct forensic analysis and provide rapid support.

Responsibilities:
- Respond to security incidents, lead triage
- Collect/log evidence for analysis
- Perform forensic analysis on compromised assets
- Conduct root cause analysis, document findings
- Develop incident playbooks and reporting

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS, InfoSec, or related
- 1+ years experience (SOC, IR, forensics)
- Knowledge of SIEM, endpoint, and forensic tools
- Calm under pressure, strong teamwork

Benefits:
- ₹8–23 LPA
- Wellness benefit, training, paid time off

UI Designer.description:
Job Summary: Create visually engaging and user-friendly digital experiences, working with product teams to turn concepts into beautiful, consistent user interfaces.

Responsibilities:
- Develop design concepts, wireframes, UI mockups
- Translate brand guidelines into pixel-perfect graphics
- Collaborate with UX, developers, product managers
- Maintain and extend design systems
- Incorporate feedback from usability testing
- Prepare assets for development hand-off

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Design, Visual Communication, or similar
- Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, Adobe CC
- Knowledge of color theory, typography, layout
- Attention to detail, creative, team-oriented

Preferred:
- Experience designing for web and mobile
- Familiar with WCAG/accessibility, basic HTML/CSS

Benefits:
- ₹6–19 LPA
- Flexible hours, upskilling budget, creative hackathons

UX Designer.description:
Job Summary: Guide the user experience from research to tested wireframes in digital product and service design.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct user research (interviews, usability testing)
- Develop personas, journey maps, and user flows
- Create and iterate wireframes, prototypes, and mockups
- Collaborate on product strategy, design workshops
- Ensure UX best practices and accessibility

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in UX, HCI, Psychology, or related
- Experience with Figma, wireframing, prototyping
- Research, analysis, empathy, collaboration

Benefits:
- ₹7–18 LPA
- L&D budget, wellness, remote work

Product Designer.description:
Job Summary: Own the holistic product design process from discovery to prototyping to high-fidelity delivery.

Responsibilities:
- Lead design sprints and validate solutions with users
- Create wireframes, high-fidelity UI, functional prototypes
- Collaborate cross-functionally (PM, Dev, Marketing)
- Evolve and document design systems
- Present and defend design choices

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Product/UX/UI Design or similar
- 2+ years end-to-end product design
- Figma/Sketch, prototyping, design thinking
- Effective communication, stakeholder engagement

Benefits:
- ₹8–22 LPA
- Creative meetups, conf budget, hybrid work

Interaction Designer.description:
Job Summary: Design interactive digital experiences, create engaging micro-interactions and ensure smooth, intuitive user flows.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and test interactive prototypes
- Design animations, transitions, feedback, and micro-interactions
- Optimize flows for usability, consistency, delight
- Collaborate with UI/UX teams and engineers

Requirements:
- Degree in Design, HCI, or related
- Experience with prototyping/animation software
- Knowledge of usability/UX principles
- Detail-oriented, creative

Benefits:
- ₹7–18 LPA
- Hackathons, wellness, creative studios

UX Researcher.description:
Job Summary: Conduct research to deeply understand users, advocate for their needs, and guide design/product direction.

Responsibilities:
- Plan and execute qualitative/quantitative studies
- Analyze and communicate user research insights
- Support usability tests, A/B tests, interviews
- Synthesize research for product teams

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Psychology, HCI, or related field
- Research methodology, strong stats/analysis
- Written and spoken communication

Benefits:
- ₹8–20 LPA
- Remote/hybrid, conf budget, wellness

Product Manager.description:
Job Summary: Drive product strategy and execution from ideation to launch and iteration, ensuring products solve real user and business problems.

Responsibilities:
- Define product vision and roadmaps
- Gather and prioritize requirements
- Lead cross-functional teams (engineering, design, marketing)
- Conduct user and market research
- Launch and iterate on products; analyze metrics and feedback
- Manage timelines, budgets, and risks

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Business, CS, or related; MBA preferred
- 2+ years in product, project, or growth roles
- Analytical and communication skills; team player
- Customer-centric mindset, problem-solver

Benefits:
- ₹12–28 LPA
- Stock options, conference travel, hybrid

Technical Product Manager.description:
Job Summary: Own the technical strategy and execution of APIs, software platforms, or complex product ecosystems.

Responsibilities:
- Define technical product requirements (APIs, platforms)
- Collaborate closely with engineers, review designs
- Ensure alignment across teams on tech direction
- Troubleshoot and prioritize technical tradeoffs
- Oversee delivery, integration, and launch

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in CS/Eng; technical background mandatory
- 2+ years as PM/engineer
- Understanding of SDLC, API design, system integration

Benefits:
- ₹13–30 LPA
- RSUs, upskilling budget, hybrid/remote

Product Owner.description:
Job Summary: Serve as the liaison between business stakeholders and the development team, defining and prioritizing product backlogs in Agile settings.

Responsibilities:
- Write user stories, prioritize product backlogs
- Ensure sprint goals align with business
- Gather feedback, refine requirements
- Communicate vision and prioritize delivery

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Business, IT, or related
- Product ownership or BA experience
- Agile/Scrum knowledge

Benefits:
- ₹10–23 LPA
- Training budget, hybrid

Growth Product Manager.description:
Job Summary: Drive product-led growth by running experiments, maximizing user acquisition, retention, and engagement with a data-driven approach.

Responsibilities:
- Lead growth, funnel, and A/B testing initiatives
- Analyze product metrics, identify opportunities
- Work with design, engineering, and marketing on experiments
- Report on KPIs and recommend action steps

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Business, CS, or Data/Analytics
- 2+ years in product/growth/analytics roles
- Analytical, data-driven, communicative

Benefits:
- ₹11–26 LPA
- L&D, marketing conf tickets, profit sharing

Product Marketing Manager.description:
Job Summary: Bridge product, marketing, and sales to define GTM strategies, product positioning, and competitive messaging.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute go-to-market plans
- Define product positioning, pricing, messaging
- Liaise between product, marketing, and sales teams
- Analyze competitors, market trends

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Business, Marketing, or related
- 2+ years marketing/product experience
- Communication and research skills

Benefits:
- ₹10–25 LPA
- RSUs, hybrid, education allowance

Digital Marketing Specialist.description:
Job Summary: Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across channels to build brand and generate leads.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and manage paid/organic campaigns (SEM, social, email)
- Analyze data to optimize ad spend and performance
- Track KPIs and report campaign ROIs
- Collaborate with sales, creative, and analytics teams
- Stay current with digital trends and tools

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Marketing, Business, or related
- 1+ years digital campaign management
- Analytical, adaptable, communication

Benefits:
- ₹7–18 LPA
- Training, health, flexible work

SEO Specialist.description:
Job Summary: Optimize websites and content to improve search rankings, traffic, and visibility.

Responsibilities:
- Conduct keyword research, on-page/off-page SEO
- Audit and optimize site architecture, technical SEO
- Create SEO-friendly content
- Monitor analytics, track rankings

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Marketing, IT, or relevant field
- 1+ years SEO experience
- Hands-on with SEO tools (Google Search Console, SEMrush)

Benefits:
- ₹6–16 LPA
- L&D, hybrid, certifications

Social Media Manager.description:
Job Summary: Build and oversee company’s social presence, strategy, and community engagement.

Responsibilities:
- Plan and schedule posts, run ad campaigns
- Build community and respond to queries
- Track and analyze engagement/metrics
- Coordinate with creative and marketing

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Marketing/Communication
- 1+ years managing social platforms

Benefits:
- ₹6–16 LPA
- Flexible/remote, creative perks

Content Marketing Manager.description:
Job Summary: Plan and create compelling content that supports branding and lead-gen initiatives.

Responsibilities:
- Devise and oversee content strategy
- Manage editorial calendars, write/edit long/short-form
- Track SEO/content performance
- Collaborate with marketing and product teams

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s English/Marketing/Media
- Excellent writing, editing, research
- Project management

Benefits:
- ₹7–18 LPA
- RSUs, writing workshops, insurance

Marketing Analytics Specialist.description:
Job Summary: Analyze marketing data and campaign performance to drive ROI and business decisions.

Responsibilities:
- Collect/analyze multi-channel data, derive insights
- Build dashboards/reports
- Support attribution modeling and A/B testing
- Advise teams based on analytics

Requirements:
- Bachelor’s in Statistics, Analytics, or Marketing
- Proficient in BI/reporting tools
